GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
tipc: check attribute length for bearer name

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 3af15272cde28fe5c8489174b8624e232c1775ec, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit cb30a63384bc91d5da06e1cede1115f666a29271. For more details please see the references link.
